creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: two horizontal images on one sheet forming continuous landscape with desert in foreground and blue and white mountains in background, with caravan of figures on camels at front; most camels clustered together in left image, one camel with rider in right image; received mounted together with L2013.104.87 and 2013.29.436
marks:
Signature and Title 
 LLC below image, in pencil: [Caravan]; LRC below i
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
title: Caravan
